name: Speedsters (Flash) Youtube Progress Bar
description: A youtube progress bar that has DC speedsters such as Flash, Godspeed and Reverse-Flash. It comes with trails that are left behind, you can also customize what the trail or the characters going be as well as make a part of the progress bar a custom colour. <mark> The Customize Tool no longer seems to work due to a Stylish issue, sorry I can't do anything about it, so Red Flash is all you can get currently.</mark>

user.name: DittoDino
user.about:
Ello there, I know basic HTML and CSS, though HTML is where I'm more advanced in, I'm also considering making multiple custom youtube progressbars, if you got any ideas for them, just message them in the discussion area and I'll see what I can do. 
My alt is BoopBop, made exclusively for roblox styles.

additional_info: If you run into any techinal issues, just comment in down below in the dicussion. You can customize certain parts through the customize settings with the speedsters and trails options only having a few predetermined options, while the colour setting for the part of the progress bar that hasn't been reached yet, that part is custom. Important info before downloading I have finally fixed the issues with the speedsters, look in updates for more info. If you also want to have your own character on the progress bar instead, it needs to be around 300 x 200 big otherwise it won't be properly shown. Update Notice Version 0.4 ~ February 6 2022 The resize issue is now fixed, so it won't be too big if you're gonna watch on a thumbnail. Version 0.3 ~ October 16th 2021 The speedsters are no longer look they're 8 bit, though this does come with a side effect, when you hover your mouse over the progress bar, a large guy will appear, and that's the only problem. Oh, and I also added a reverse-flash looking speedster. Version 0.2 ~ October 7th 2021 Its more transparent now.

style_settings.label: Part of the progress bar that hasn't been reached yet
